name: N7 Helmet
description: Dual layer of fabric armor and kinetic padding within a lightweight ablative ceramic shell. Comes standard with a suite of communication, navigation, and battlefield awareness software.
feature: You have advantage on initiative rolls. You are considered proficient with this armor even if you lack proficiency with medium armor.
setBonus: Set bonus (3 of 4): Increase your hit points by 1 for each level you have gained. --Set bonus (4 of 4): Increase your hit points by 1 for each level you have gained.
